forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.
